marketNews.title: SIDO 2024: Net Profit +23% YoY, Slightly Above Expectations
marketNews.content: Herbal and Pharmaceutical Industry Sido Muncul ($SIDO) [recorded](https://investor.sidomuncul.co.id/misc/fr/2024/FY-2024.pdf) a net profit of 393 billion rupiah in 4Q24 (+8% YoY, +132% QoQ). This result brings the net profit for 2024 to 1.17 trillion rupiah (+23% YoY), slightly above consensus expectations and relatively in line with our expectations as it is equivalent to 103/98% of consensus/Stockbit estimates. For your information, SIDO management targeted a minimum net profit growth of +10% YoY for 2024. The solid net profit growth throughout 2024 was driven by fairly good revenue growth as well as higher margins. Recovery in the 'Herbal' Segment Revenue from the companyâ€™s main segment, 'Herbal', returned to positive annual growth to 943 billion rupiah (+6% YoY, +118% QoQ), after experiencing a -4% YoY decline [in 3Q24](https://stockbit.com/post/16138829). This result caused SIDO's total revenue to grow +7% YoY in 4Q24 and +10% YoY throughout 2024, relatively in line with management's guidance targeting a minimum growth of +10% YoY throughout 2024. The positive revenue performance in 4Q24 also had a positive impact on SIDO's gross profit margin which rose to 62.9% (vs. 4Q23: 62.3%, 3Q24: 52.6%). Reinvestment in A&P SIDO appeared to reinvest 4Q24 gross profit (+8% YoY, +112% QoQ) into advertising and promotion (A&P), where this expense item increased to 188 billion rupiah (+17% YoY, +113% QoQ). The A&P ratio to revenue also rose from 10.9% in 2023 to 11.7% in 2024. This A&P reinvestment led to an increase in opex to 308 billion rupiah in 4Q24 (+26% YoY, +85% QoQ), thus making core operating profit in 4Q24 relatively flat at 505 billion rupiah (+0% YoY, +133% QoQ). Nevertheless, core operating profit throughout 2024 still grew solidly by +19% YoY to 1.47 trillion rupiah, with EBIT growing +24% YoY. Key Takeaway SIDO management targets revenue and net profit growth of +10% YoY each for 2025, higher than consensus expectations which project growth at +8% YoY. SIDO management will hold an earnings call for 2024 performance on Monday (10/3) afternoon.

marketNews.title: CUAN 2024: Net Profit +929% YoY, Potential for Dividends
marketNews.content: The meeting discussed a number of strategic government issues, ranging from the free lunch program, infrastructure development, efforts for food and energy self-sufficiency, strengthening the textile industry and industrialization, to investment management through the Danantara Investment Management Agency. CNN Indonesia reported that President Prabowo called the conglomerates again on Friday (7/3) - with the addition of Anindya Bakrie, Haji Isam, and Chairul Tanjung - to meet with Ray Dalio, who is said to be entering the Danantara advisory board.

marketNews.title: US President Donald Trump Suspends Tariffs on USMCA Goods
marketNews.content: US President Donald Trump on Thursday (6/3) suspended the 25% tariff on imported goods from Canada and Mexico covered by the United States-Mexico-Canada Agreement (USMCA). The suspension will end on April 2, 2025, the day Trump is expected to impose retaliatory tariffs on all trading partners hindering US trade. Despite announcing the suspension, the US will still impose a 10% tariff on Canadian energy products because not all energy products from that country are covered by the USMCA agreement negotiated by the Trump administration during its first term. This suspension came only 2 days after Trump implemented a 25% import tariff on Canada and Mexico.

marketNews.title: Government Allows Metal Mineral Companies to Export Raw Ore for 6 Months Under Force Majeure
marketNews.content: The government allows metal mineral companies to export raw ore for 6 months if their smelters experience force majeure, based on [new regulations](https://wplibrary.co.id/sites/default/files/ESDM%206%20TAHUN%202025.pdf). This rule change occurred amidst PT Freeport Indonesia's request to the government for relaxation of copper concentrate export, following the company's smelter fire in October 2024. Minister of Energy and Mineral Resources, Bahlil Lahadalia, [stated](https://industri.kontan.co.id/news/freeport-kantongi-izin-ekspor-konsentrat-tembaga-sekitar-1-juta-ton) on Friday (7/3) that the Ministry has granted PT Freeport Indonesia an export permit for approximately 1 million tons of copper concentrate until June 2025.

marketNews.title: China's Coal Imports Rose 2.1% YoY in 2M24
marketNews.content: China's customs authority [noted](https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/chinas-coal-imports-tick-up-january-february-despite-risks-outlook-2025-03-07/) that China's coal imports grew +2.1% YoY during 2M24 to 76.12 million tons. Nevertheless, Reuters reported that China's coal imports could weaken going forward, as supplies increase, leading the Chinese coal industry association to call for import restrictions. Previously, the China Coal Transportation and Distribution Association predicted that China's coal imports in 2025 would drop -3.3% YoY to 525 million tons from the all-time high record in 2024.

marketNews.title: Indonesia's Foreign Exchange Reserves Fell to USD 154.5 Billion in February 2025
marketNews.content: Bank Indonesia [recorded](https://www.bi.go.id/id/publikasi/ruang-media/news-release/Pages/sp_274925.aspx) that Indonesia's foreign exchange reserves at the end of February 2025 fell to USD 154.5 billion (vs. January 2025: USD 156.1 billion), equivalent to financing 6.6 months of imports or 6.4 months of imports and government foreign debt payments. This development was influenced by, among other things, government foreign debt payments and the policy of stabilizing the rupiah exchange rate as a response by Bank Indonesia in facing high global financial market uncertainty.

marketNews.title: Household NPL Ratio Rose to 2.17% in January 2025, Still Within Reasonable Limits
marketNews.content: Bank Indonesia [recorded](https://epaper.kontan.co.id/mobile/harian/2025/03/07) that the Non-Performing Loan (NPL) ratio for household credit rose to 2.17% in January 2025, higher than the 1.9% level in January 2024 and 2.02% in December 2024. Nevertheless, the Head of Banking Supervision OJK, Dian Ediana Rae, stated that the OJK still sees this NPL ratio as within reasonable limits. Dian also assessed that government programs to strengthen public purchasing power this year could provide optimism regarding public repayment ability.

marketNews.title: Indonesia Needs 4 Million Kiloliters of Additional Biodiesel Production Capacity to Meet 2026 B50 Mandate
marketNews.content: Secretary General of the Indonesian Biodiesel Producers Association (APROBI), Ernest Gunawan, [stated](https://www.reuters.com/business/energy/indonesia-needs-expand-biodiesel-capacity-b50-industry-group-says-2025-03-06/) on Thursday (6/3) that Indonesia requires an additional 4 million kiloliters of biodiesel production to meet the B50 mandate targeted for implementation in 2026. The implementation of B50 is projected to increase biodiesel demand to 19 million kiloliters per year. Indonesia currently has an installed capacity for biodiesel production of about 19.6 million kiloliters, but Ernest explained that the average utilization rate of production facilities only reached 85% of installed capacity due to maintenance activities.

marketNews.title: Maxim Indonesia Will Not Provide THR to Ojol Drivers, Citing Partnership Status and Existing Regulations
marketNews.content: Maxim Indonesia Public Relations Specialist, Yuan Ifdal Khoir, [stated](https://www.cnnindonesia.com/ekonomi/20250307102303-92-1206065/maxim-tak-beri-thr-ke-driver-ojol-ini-3-alasannya) on Friday (7/3) that the company will not provide holiday allowance (THR) to online motorcycle taxi (ojol) drivers, amid government [efforts](<https://snips.stockbit.com/snips-terbaru/-ihsg-55-pekan-ini-mulai-tunjukkan-tanda-pemulihan#:~:text=Menteri%20Ketenagakerjaan%2C%20Yassierli%2C%C2%A0mengatakan%C2%A0pada%20Rabu%20(5/3)%20bahwa%C2%A0pemerintah%20mengusulkan%20tunjangan%20hari%20raya%C2%A0(THR)%C2%A0untuk%20pengemudi%20ojek%20online%C2%A0(ojol)%C2%A0diberikan%20dalam%20bentuk%20uang%20tunai.%20Meski%20demikian%2C%20formula%20akhir%20untuk%20pembayaran%20THR%20ojol%20masih%20dibahas%20dengan%C2%A0stakeholder%C2%A0terkait.>) to release regulations regarding cash THR for ojol. Yuan explained that Maxim Indonesia's stance takes into account several factors, such as the partnership status between ojol and the company, the company's financial condition, and the conflict of this discourse with existing regulations.

marketNews.title: Ministry of Industry Issues TKDN Certificates for Apple Products, Including iPhone 16 Series
marketNews.content: Ministry of Industry Spokesperson, Febri Hendri Antoni Arif, [said](https://www.antaranews.com/berita/4694897/sertifikat-tkdn-terbit-iphone-16-siap-masuk-pasar-indonesia) on Friday (7/3) that the Ministry has issued 20 local content level (TKDN) certificates for several Apple products (Nasdaq: AAPL), including the iPhone 16 series. However, Febri mentioned that Apple cannot yet sell the products that have received the TKDN certificates because they are still waiting for other further procedures. The issuance of these TKDN certificates is a follow-up to the [investment agreement](https://snips.stockbit.com/snips-terbaru/-inco-2024-laba-bersih-79-yoy-di-bawah-ekspektasi#:~:text=Menteri%20Perindustrian%2C%20Agus,tersebut%20akan%20diberikan.) between Apple and the Indonesian government in late February 2025.

tickerNews.title: Petrindo Jaya Kreasi (CUAN) Net Profit Soared in 4Q24 Driven by One-Time Gain from Acquisitions
tickerNews.content: $CUAN: Petrindo Jaya Kreasi's net profit in 4Q24 surged to USD 130 million (vs. 3Q24: USD 0.9 million, 4Q23: USD 4 million), so that the net profit for 2024 [was recorded](https://emitten-announcement.stockbit.com/attachments/CUAN_Final_Report_31_Des_2024.pdf) at USD 161 million (+929% YoY). The annual net profit jump in 4Q24 was mainly caused by a one-time effect from a discount purchase gain of USD 152 million, derived from the acquisition transaction of PT Multi Tambangjaya Utama and Petrosea ($PTRO). On the other hand, gross profit in 4Q24 decreased (-81% QoQ, -11% YoY) along with a rise in the cost of revenue (+28% QoQ, +1,951% YoY) which grew higher than revenue (+8% QoQ, +1,099% YoY) due to expansion efforts. Throughout 2024, revenue grew +719% YoY to USD 802 million, with gross profit growing +217% YoY to USD 118 million. CUAN also recorded positive retained earnings of USD 124.1 million at the end of 2024 (vs. 2023: negative USD 36.7 million), allowing the company to distribute dividends for the 2024 fiscal year.

tickerNews.title: Adaro Andalan Indonesia (AADI) Likely Will Not Distribute Dividends for 2024 FY
tickerNews.content: $AADI: Adaro Andalan Indonesia will likely not distribute dividends for the 2024 fiscal year profit, according to company discussions with Stockbit. This possibility is based on several considerations, such as AADI which just IPO'd in December 2024, current cash levels, and 2025 capex needs with an allocation of approximately USD 250-300 million. Nevertheless, the final decision regarding the 2024 fiscal year dividend distribution will only be known at the upcoming GMS. Historically, Alamtri Resources Indonesia ($ADRO) - the entity that housed AADI before its spin-off - distributed final dividends in May, with interim dividends in December.

tickerNews.title: Two BBNI Directors Purchased Shares
tickerNews.content: $BBNI: Two directors of Bank Negara Indonesia, [Royke Tumilaar](https://www.idx.co.id/StaticData/NewsAndAnnouncement/ANNOUNCEMENTSTOCK/From_EREP/202503/5678a0d8f6_455da9f3f1.pdf) and [Hussein Paolo Kartadjoemena](https://www.idx.co.id/StaticData/NewsAndAnnouncement/ANNOUNCEMENTSTOCK/From_EREP/202503/c482fbb65f_7af04c95b4.pdf), respectively purchased 186,200 and 268,300 BBNI shares at an average price of 4,030 rupiah per share and 4,101 rupiah per share on February 28, 2025. The total transaction value reached approximately 750 million rupiah and 1.1 billion rupiah, respectively. After this transaction, Royke's and Hussein's ownership in BBNI increased to 0.01663% and 0.00824%.

tickerNews.title: BRI President Director Sunarso Purchased BBRI Shares
tickerNews.content: $BBRI: The President Director of Bank Rakyat Indonesia, Sunarso, purchased 212,800 thousand BBRI shares at an average price of 3,630 rupiah per share on March 4, 2025. The total transaction value reached approximately 772 million rupiah. After [this transaction](https://www.idx.co.id/StaticData/NewsAndAnnouncement/ANNOUNCEMENTSTOCK/From_EREP/202503/d941650f08_24c994fd6a.pdf), Sunarso's ownership in BBRI increased from 0.0039% to 0.0040%.

tickerNews.title: MYOR Targets Double-Digit Revenue Growth in 2025, Lower CAPEX Planned
tickerNews.content: $MYOR: Mayora Indah management stated in the 4Q24 earnings call on Thursday (6/3) afternoon that the company targets revenue growth in the double digits throughout 2025, indicating a range of +12-15% YoY. MYOR management also targets a gross profit margin in the range of 23-25% throughout 2025 (vs. 2024 realization: 23%), assuming coffee and cocoa prices remain relatively stable at current levels until year-end. For advertising and promotion spending in 2025, management targets this expense item to grow no larger than revenue growth. Additionally, MYOR management sees [_capex during 2025_](https://industri.kontan.co.id/news/mayora-myor-siapkan-capex-rp-1-triliun-untuk-dukung-target-pertumbuhan-2025) as likely to be lower this year, with a capex allocation of 1 trillion rupiah (vs. 2024 capex realization: ~1.8 trillion rupiah), the majority of which is designated for 'replacement' purposes.

tickerNews.title: LPPF Net Profit Soared in 4Q24, Proposes Final Dividend of IDR 300 per Share
tickerNews.content: $LPPF: Matahari Department Store [recorded](https://www.idx.co.id/StaticData/NewsAndAnnouncement/ANNOUNCEMENTSTOCK/From_EREP/202403/20250307160633-49767-0/FINAL_MDS_FS%20Audited_2024.pdf) a net profit of 205 billion rupiah in 4Q24 (+358% YoY, 3Q24: loss of 4 billion rupiah). This result brought the net profit for 2024 to 828 billion rupiah (+23% YoY), exceeding expectations as it accounted for 123% of consensus estimates. The surge in net profit in 4Q24 was driven by the expansion of the gross profit margin to 68% (vs. 4Q23: 63%, 3Q24: 65%) and a decrease in opex-to-sales to 47% (vs. 4Q23: 50%, 3Q24: 60%). This achievement caused the operating profit margin for 2024 to rise to 20% (vs. 2023: 18%). Operationally, SSSG weakened to -1.7% YoY in 2024 (vs. 9M24: -1.6% YoY). In the earnings call on Friday (7/3), LPPF management proposed a final dividend of 300 rupiah per share, indicating a dividend yield of ~17.4% as of Friday (7/3).

tickerNews.title: ABMM Plans Expansion into Gold Mining in 2025 to Reduce Coal Dependency
tickerNews.content: $ABMM: ABM Investama Director, Hans Christian Manoe, [stated](https://investor.id/market/391414/abm-investama-abmm-ekspansi-bisnis-emas) on Thursday (6/3) that the company plans to expand into gold mining in 2025, aimed at reducing the company's EBITDA dependence on coal. Hans mentioned that based on the feasibility study conducted by the company, the gold mining business offers better margins compared to other minerals like copper, nickel, and others. Hans stated that ABMM is still searching for potential gold mining assets for acquisition, adding that there are 2 brownfield gold mines with relatively small production capacity already in the company's pipeline. To finance this corporate action, Hans explained that the acquisition of gold mines will use financing consisting of 75% bank loans and 25% equity.

tickerNews.title: BSDE Targets Marketing Sales of IDR 10 Trillion in 2025, Moderately Higher than 2024 Realization
tickerNews.content: $BSDE: Bumi Serpong Damai targets marketing sales of 10 trillion rupiah throughout 2025, which is relatively moderate as it is only about +3% higher than the marketing sales realization during 2024 at 9.72 trillion rupiah (vs. 2024 target: 9.5 trillion rupiah). BSDE mentioned that the acquisition of Suryamas Dutamakmur ($SMDM) in 2024 will provide additional marketing sales for the company, with a contribution of about 3% of the total 2025 target. BSDE also projects marketing sales from land sales to joint ventures to reach 1.5 trillion rupiah in 2025 (vs. 2024 realization: 565 billion rupiah).

tickerNews.title: PT Dua Samudera Perkasa Increased TEBE Ownership
tickerNews.content: $TEBE: Dana Brata Luhur shareholder, PT Dua Samudera Perkasa, purchased approximately 23.7 million TEBE shares at an average price of 500 rupiah per share on March 5, 2025. The total transaction value reached approximately 12 billion rupiah. After [this transaction](https://www.idx.co.id/StaticData/NewsAndAnnouncement/ANNOUNCEMENTSTOCK/From_EREP/202503/476de9bb65_78f5ddaffd.pdf), PT Dua Samudera Perkasa's ownership in TEBE increased from 10.65% to 12.5%.

tickerNews.title: POWR Completed Debt Issuance Roadshow and Pricing, Setting Principal Amount at USD 350 Million with 5.65% Interest Rate
tickerNews.content: $POWR: Cikarang Listrindo [announced](https://www.idx.co.id/StaticData/NewsAndAnnouncement/ANNOUNCEMENTSTOCK/From_EREP/202503/e543cbed69_e7acd098b3.pdf) the completion of the roadshow and pricing process related to its plan to issue debt securities, with the principal amount set at USD 350 million and an interest rate of 5.65% per annum. This result is a continuation of the [roadshow](https://snips.stockbit.com/snips-terbaru/-inco-2024-laba-bersih-79-yoy-di-bawah-ekspektasi#:~:text=%24POWR%3A%C2%A0Cikarang,surat%20utang%20sebelumnya.) conducted from February 26 to March 4, 2025, for the issuance of up to USD 500 million in debt securities on the Singapore Stock Exchange, intended for refinancing debt previously issued in 2016. The interest rate on the new debt securities issued only rose by +70 bps compared to the previous debt securities.
